name: Inmobapp SL
description: Provider of hotel booking application designed to help in last minute hotel bookings. The company's hotel booking application provide details of hotels and helps to book at a lower rate, enabling users to book hotels with a click at last moments.
one_liner: Provider of hotel booking application designed to help in last minute hotel bookings. The company's hotel booking application provide details of hotels and helps to book at a lower rate, enabling users to book hotels with a click at last moments.
